about_the_game:
This beautiful color art book features illustrations of the characters, events and backgrounds from CORPSE FACTORY.

A digital artbook in .PDF format.

36 pages.


[LOCATING YOUR DLC ONCE PURCHASED & DOWNLOADED]

DLC files are downloaded to your game's Steam directory after purchase. The default location is:

\Program Files (x86)\SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\CORPSE FACTORY\

If this is not valid on your computer, locate your game's install directory using these instructions:

- Open the Steam client and navigate to your game library
- Right-click the entry for CORPSE FACTORY and select Properties
- Click the Local Files tab
- Click Browse Local Files

This will open the game's directory, and once your DLC is installed, you'll be able to view the files.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX® 10 Compatible Graphics Card
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 8 (64-bit) or better
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 660 or better
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
